answers.answer: Sorry this autocorrect is messing me up
I am also having a great pregnancy which is amazing but a lot of people are telling me that means a hell of a birth so I'm a little nervous
Me!!! Stomach bothers me every now and again. But no nausea or anything . && I hope it stays that way
Are you ladies having girls?  I am having a girl I'm just curious to see what you are having

I am having a boy and a great pregnancy. I am almost 38 weeks and very little problems. Nothing near what i expected from what everyone tells me. No cravings, sickness,  etc. My friend said the same and had her baby a few months ago and said it was much easier and less painful than everyone made it seem, so easy birth doesn't necessarily mean bad labor. She had gestational diabetes too. I've gone this time thinking it is what you make it. I said if i dont think about getting sick, etc i wont and i didnt. Fingers crossed birth goes the same for all of us.

Same here with all 3 of my pregnancies no morning sickness just a stuffy nose, runny nose, and sneezing all the time but that's about it my last two i had a great pregnancy n great births they were easy n not that painful!

My first one was good till twenty weeks then diagnosed with preeclampsia.  Had my daughter at 37.5 but I didn't have morning sickness or cravings very easy.  My labour only lasted 7 1/2 hours and only a couple pushes. Wasn't even painful. They had to put a contraction belt on me because I didn't scream or anything.  I didn't even take pain meds or anything it was all natural.

30 weeks with a boy and so far feeling great really.  Much better than I anticipated!  Just starting to get a bit of fatigue and feeling big! Otherwise,  life as normal so far! Here's hoping it stays this way for us!!

Well I had every symptom under the sun and was placed in bed rest due to early complications but these last few months have been fantastic! I'm excited 14 days to go until my EDD! I can't wait to meet my baby girl!!! I wish you all the best!!

question: Anyone having a good pregnancy?? I don't want to jinx myself but I k am having a great one..no morning sickness. .cramps..cravings..the only thing is my back hurt off and on through the day ..but not everyday!  I realLynn don't feel pregnancy test until my baby move..lol this is my first. .I am so thankful that I haven't experienced anything else..I always thought my pregnancy would be terrible bc of other women stories
title: pregnancy
